objects.name: tutorialText
objects.string:
Left Click to select survivors.
Right Click to deselect survivors.
Left Click and Hold to drag survivors around.
When two survivors are selected, a combine 
button will appear, which depending on the
survivors selected, will have different outcomes.
Press Esc to open the pause menu.
Press End Day button to end the day, increase day
counter by 1, add resources depending on the
stats of your survivors.
You have 10 days to reach the target resources
to have your haven succeed.

content.text:
Left Click to select survivors.
Right Click to deselect survivors.
Left Click and Hold to drag survivors around.
When two survivors are selected, a combine 
button will appear, which depending on the
survivors selected, will have different outcomes.
Press Esc to open the pause menu.
Press End Day button to end the day, increase day
counter by 1, add resources depending on the
stats of your survivors.
You have 10 days to reach the target resources
to have your haven succeed.

events.comment: make sure number of things selected can't go over 2 or below 0
